page.title: 19Societies in Much Wenlock.
page.content: {The Women's Institute}has a membership of{50.}The majority of members are aged 35 to 65 although one member is over 80. They meet once a month and after discussing future meetings and outings, they have a speaker or demonstrator on some interesting topic {The St. John's Ambulance Brigade}has approximately{10 adult members}and{14 {cadets and juniors.}Apart from meeting weekly in Much Wenlock, they are on duty at Telford ice rink and the West Midland Show. They also give talks, demonstrations and film shows to different organizations. {The Civic Society}was formed in{1984 and has{75}members.The members are aged between 28 and 81. Their aim is to promote high standards of planning and architecture and to educate and inform the general public in the local geography, history and architecture.
